ðŸ’¡ rustypaste | Rust
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Sharing files and text snippets quickly and easily via a web service.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ File upload â€¢ URL shortening â€¢ Expiration â€¢ One-shot links â€¢ MIME type guessing
ðŸ“– Summary: Rustypaste is a minimal, self-hostable file upload and pastebin service written in Rust. It supports features like file uploading, URL shortening, setting expiration times for files, one-shot links, MIME type guessing, and optional authentication. It can be deployed via Docker or built from source.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project â€¢ Homepage ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

ðŸ’¡ PSCompletions | PowerShell
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Improving and simplifying tab-completion in PowerShell.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ More powerful completion menu â€¢ Manage completions together â€¢ Sort completion items dynamically by frequency of use â€¢ Switch between languages freely â€¢ Combined with argc-completions
ðŸ“– Summary: PSCompletions is a PowerShell module designed to enhance the tab-completion experience. It provides a more powerful completion menu, allows for managing completions, dynamically sorts completion items based on usage frequency, and supports multiple languages. It aims to simplify and improve the user's interaction with PowerShell by offering intelligent and customizable tab completion.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project â€¢ Homepage ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

ðŸ”¥ Mantella | Python
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Enabling natural language conversations with NPCs in Skyrim and Fallout 4, enhancing immersion and gameplay.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Speech-to-text using Whisper â€¢ LLM-based dialogue generation â€¢ Text-to-speech using Piper, xVASynth, and XTTS â€¢ Mod support for Skyrim and Fallout 4 â€¢ Python-based implementation
ðŸ“– Summary: Mantella is a Python-based mod for Skyrim and Fallout 4 that enables natural language interaction with NPCs. It leverages speech-to-text (Whisper), Large Language Models (LLMs) for response generation, and text-to-speech (Piper, xVASynth, XTTS) for vocalization, creating a more immersive and dynamic gameplay experience.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project â€¢ Homepage ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

ðŸŒŸ ungoogled-chromium | Python
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Providing a Chromium-based browser experience without reliance on Google's web services, enhancing user privacy and control.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Disabling functionality specific to Google domains (e.g., Google Host Detector, Google URL Tracker, Google Cloud Messaging) â€¢ Blocking internal requests to Google at runtime using domain substitution
ðŸ“– Summary: The ungoogled-chromium project aims to provide a version of Google Chromium without dependencies on Google web services. It focuses on enhancing privacy, control, and transparency by removing Google-specific code and binaries, while retaining the default Chromium experience as closely as possible.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

ðŸš€ flow-like | Rust
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Visual workflow automation for business processes, data integration, and AI-powered workflows.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Fully Typed Workflows â€¢ Built on Rust â€¢ Zero-to-Prod workflow design â€¢ AI-Powered Automation â€¢ Deploy Anywhere
ðŸ“– Summary: Flow-Like is a visual workflow automation platform built with Rust, designed for enterprise-scale projects. It allows users to create automated workflows using a drag-and-drop interface, providing a clear record of data flow and changes. It supports AI integration, customizability, and deployment across various environments.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project â€¢ Homepage ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

ðŸš€ vimmaster | JavaScript
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Learning and practicing Vim commands in an interactive game environment.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Normal/Insert modes â€¢ Command log â€¢ Progressive Levels with outcome validation â€¢ Complete Vim Support for core commands â€¢ Numeric counts for motions/operators
ðŸ“– Summary: VIM Master is an in-browser game designed to teach users core Vim motions and editing commands through a series of short, focused levels. It provides a hands-on learning experience with features like normal/insert modes, command logging, progress tracking, and even a cheat mode for quick reference.
